label: CountdownToNoonApp
peekOfCode:
class CountdownToNoonApp:
    def __init__(self, root):
        self.root = root
        self.root.title("Đồng hồ đếm ngược đến 12h trưa")
        self.var_thoi_gian = tk.StringVar()
        self.var_thoi_gian.set("00:00:00")
        self.label_thoi_gian = ttk.Label(root, textvariable=self.var_thoi_gian, font=("Helvetica", 48))
        self.label_thoi_gian.pack(pady=20)
        ttk.Button(root, text="Bắt đầu", command=self.bat_dau_dem_nguoc).pack(pady=20)
        ttk.Button(root, text="Dừng", command=self.dung_dem_nguoc).pack(pady=10)
